cashier.description: cashier url, Note possible error codes: ASK_TNC_APPROVAL (API tnc_approval), ASK_AUTHENTICATE, ASK_UK_FUNDS_PROTECTION (API tnc_approval), ASK_CURRENCY (API set_account_currency), ASK_EMAIL_VERIFY (verify_email), ASK_FIX_DETAILS (API set_settings)

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
